content: this increase row on row 8 row 8 knit across row 9 k2 p to last two stitches k2 row 10 k3 kfb repeat to last stitch 35 sts row 11 k2 p to last two stitches k2 row 12 divide onto 3 dpns as follows first needle - k4 kfb 2 times 2nd needle - k4 kfb 2 times 3rd needle - k4 kfb 2 times k4 slip last stitch to first needle -joining the round you will wind up with 41 sts on three needles 13 sts 12 sts 16 sts which are joined in the round round 13 k2tog knit around 40 sts round 14 knit around round 15 knit around for short dress omit row 15 and 16 round 16 knit around i suggest you try the dress on here for length you may need to add a round or two round 17 purl around round 18 knit around purl cast off and weave in the end button loop using a small crochet hook chain 5 or 6 with the tail left from your original cast on slip_stitch into the garment about 1/4 lower down weave in the end sew on a small button © dawn smith 10/8/23 2
